content.text: As a Senior Developer at Fashionphile, I contributed to the development of e-commerce and inventory management solutions for the luxury resale market. Focused on optimizing UI performance, integrating third-party APIs, and improving operational efficiency as part of the Seller team.
Refactored front-end components to improve site performance and user experience. Reduced load times and enhanced accessibility for a high-traffic luxury resale platform.
Developed integrations with DataDog for tracking user analytics in real-time. Worked with dedicated data team to build reports and polish presentable data summaries.
